bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Alternative Names yong zhang 擁脹 , congestion with distension; zhang yong , 脹壅 , distension with obstruction; zhang pi , 脹痞 , distension with an obstacle-illness. Illness Sign of a feeling of obstructions with swelling and distension. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry ma fen 麻蕡：根主產 難，衣不出，破血，壅脹 , “The roots control difficult births, when the placenta fails to descend, bleeding from an injury, and obstruction with distension ”.

②Used as a verb in the sense of “to obstruct”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qian niu zi 牽牛子 , LSZ: 予思此乃濕熱之邪在精道，壅脹隧路 , “I think that this is an intrusion of moisture and heat into the path of essence/semen, where they obstruct the internal passageway”.
